name: abnormal-security
label: Abnormal Security
description: Abnormal Security helps to prevent email and email-like attacks, automate your security operations and reduce your total spend with one extensible platform.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Abnormal Security server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Access Token
fields.name: access_token
fields.description: Specify the access token used to access the Abnormal Security server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Threats
operations.description: Retrieves detailed list of threats based on the parameters that you have specified

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filter, currently the only key that is supported is receivedTime. At least 1 of gte/lte must be specified, with a datetime string following the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format.
parameters.description: Specify the filter, currently the only key that is supported is receivedTime. At least 1 of gte/lte must be specified, with a datetime string following the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format.

parameters.title: Source
parameters.name: source
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the source of detection. Default value is all.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the source of detection. Default value is all.

parameters.title: Sender
parameters.name: sender
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the name or email address of the sender.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the name or email address of the sender.

parameters.title: Recipient
parameters.name: recipient
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the name or email address of the recipient.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the name or email address of the recipient.

parameters.title: Subject
parameters.name: subject
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the email subject.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the email subject.

parameters.title: Topic
parameters.name: topic
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the topic of email contents.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the topic of email contents.

parameters.title: Attack Type
parameters.name: attackType
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the type of attack.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the type of attack.

parameters.title: Attack Vector
parameters.name: attackVector
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the attack vector.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the attack vector.

parameters.title: Attack Strategy
parameters.name: attackStrategy
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the attack strategy.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the attack strategy.

parameters.title: Impersonated Party
parameters.name: impersonatedParty
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the impersonated party.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the impersonated party.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of threats on each page. Each page of data will have at most pageSize threats. Has no effect if filter is not specified. Default value is 100.
parameters.description: Specify the number of threats on each page. Each page of data will have at most pageSize threats. Has no effect if filter is not specified. Default value is 100.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.tooltip: 1-indexed page number to get a particular page of threats. Has no effect if filter is not specified. Default value is 1.
parameters.description: 1-indexed page number to get a particular page of threats. Has no effect if filter is not specified. Default value is 1.

operations.title: Get Threat Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of threat based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Threat ID
parameters.name: threatId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the UUID of the threat whose details you want to retrieve from the Abnormal Security server.
parameters.description: Specify the UUID of the threat whose details you want to retrieve from the Abnormal Security server.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.tooltip: Number of messages corresponding to threat in each page. Each page of data will have at most pageSize message. Currently ignored, only 10 results for messages will show. Supported will be added in a future version. Total results returned cannot exceed 10000 due to database limitations. Default value is 100.
parameters.description: Number of messages corresponding to threat in each page. Each page of data will have at most pageSize message. Currently ignored, only 10 results for messages will show. Supported will be added in a future version. Total results returned cannot exceed 10000 due to database limitations. Default value is 100.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.tooltip: 1-indexed page number to get a particular page of threat messages. Currently ignored, only 10 results for messages will show. Supported will be added in a future version. Total results returned cannot exceed 10000 due to database limitations. Default value is 1.
parameters.description: 1-indexed page number to get a particular page of threat messages. Currently ignored, only 10 results for messages will show. Supported will be added in a future version. Total results returned cannot exceed 10000 due to database limitations. Default value is 1.

operations.title: Get Threat Links
operations.description: Get information of links in a threat campaign.

parameters.title: Threat ID
parameters.name: threatId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the UUID of the threat whose links you want to retrieve from the Abnormal Security server.
parameters.description: Specify the UUID of the threat whose links you want to retrieve from the Abnormal Security server.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

operations.title: Get Threat Attachments
operations.description: Get attachment details of a threat campaign.

parameters.title: Threat ID
parameters.name: threatId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the UUID of the threat whose attachment details you want to retrieve from the Abnormal Security server.
parameters.description: Specify the UUID of the threat whose attachment details you want to retrieve from the Abnormal Security server.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

operations.title: Get Cases
operations.description: Get a list of Abnormal cases identified by Abnormal Security.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filter. At least 1 of gte/lte must be specified, with a datetime string following the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format.
parameters.description: Specify the filter. At least 1 of gte/lte must be specified, with a datetime string following the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of cases on each page. Each page of data will have at most pageSize cases. Has no effect if filter is not specified. Default value is 100.
parameters.description: Specify the number of cases on each page. Each page of data will have at most pageSize cases. Has no effect if filter is not specified. Default value is 100.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.tooltip: 1-indexed page number to get a particular page of cases. Has no effect if filter is not specified. Default value is 1.
parameters.description: 1-indexed page number to get a particular page of cases. Has no effect if filter is not specified. Default value is 1.

operations.title: Get Case Details
operations.description: Get details of an Abnormal case.

parameters.title: Case ID
parameters.name: caseId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the case ID whose details you want to retrieve from Abnormal Security server.
parameters.description: Specify the case ID whose details you want to retrieve from Abnormal Security server.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

operations.title: Get Message Details
operations.description: Get details of the remediation history for a threat log message.

parameters.title: Message ID
parameters.name: messageId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ABX Message Id of a message.
parameters.description: Specify the ABX Message Id of a message.

operations.title: Get Abuse Campaigns
operations.description: Get a list of campaigns submitted to Abuse Mailbox.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filter, currently the only key lastReportedTime is supported. At least one of gte/lte must be specified, with a datetime string following the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format. Do note that provided filter time is in UTC.
parameters.description: Specify the filter, currently the only key lastReportedTime is supported. At least one of gte/lte must be specified, with a datetime string following the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format. Do note that provided filter time is in UTC.

parameters.title: Sender
parameters.name: sender
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the name or email address of the sender.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the name or email address of the sender.

parameters.title: Recipient
parameters.name: recipient
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the name or email address of the recipient.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the name or email address of the recipient.

parameters.title: Subject
parameters.name: subject
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the email subject.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the email subject.

parameters.title: Reporter
parameters.name: reporter
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the reporter name or email address.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the reporter name or email address.

parameters.title: Attack Type
parameters.name: attackType
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the type of attack.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the type of attack.

parameters.title: Threat Type
parameters.name: threatType
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the type of threat.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the type of threat.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of abuse campaigns shown on each page. Each page of data will have at most page size abuse campaign IDs. Default value is 100.
parameters.description: Specify the number of abuse campaigns shown on each page. Each page of data will have at most page size abuse campaign IDs. Default value is 100.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.tooltip: 1-indexed page number to get a particular page of abuse campaigns. Has no effect if filter is not specified. Default value is 1.
parameters.description: 1-indexed page number to get a particular page of abuse campaigns. Has no effect if filter is not specified. Default value is 1.

operations.title: Get Abuse Campaign Details
operations.description: Get details of an Abuse Mailbox campaign.

parameters.title: Campaign ID

parameters.description: Specify the UUID of abuse campaign whose details you want to retrieve from Abnormal Security server.

parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

operations.title: Get Employee Login Information
operations.description: Get employee login information for last 30 days in csv format.

operations.title: Get Detection Reports
operations.description: Get a list of Detection 360° reports that you have submitted and view corresponding details for each case, including report summaries, statuses, message analyses, and more.

parameters.title: Inquiry Type
parameters.name: inquiry_type
parameters.tooltip: Specify whether to fetch missed attacks or false positives.
parameters.description: Specify whether to fetch missed attacks or false positives.

parameters.title: Start
parameters.name: start
parameters.tooltip: The start of the datetime range, as an RFC 3339 timestamp, to fetch Detection 360° cases from. Defaults to 30 days before end.
parameters.description: The start of the datetime range, as an RFC 3339 timestamp, to fetch Detection 360° cases from. Defaults to 30 days before end.

parameters.title: End
parameters.name: end
parameters.tooltip: The end of the datetime range, as an RFC 3339 timestamp, to fetch Detection 360° cases from. Defaults to the current time.
parameters.description: The end of the datetime range, as an RFC 3339 timestamp, to fetch Detection 360° cases from. Defaults to the current time.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Only Detection 360° cases with these statuses will be retrieved. Defaults to all statuses.
parameters.description: Only Detection 360° cases with these statuses will be retrieved. Defaults to all statuses.

operations.title: Check Case Action Status
operations.description: Check the status of an action requested on a case.

parameters.title: Case ID
parameters.name: caseId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the case ID.
parameters.description: Specify the case ID.

parameters.title: Action ID
parameters.name: actionId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the UUID representing the action ID for a case.
parameters.description: Specify the UUID representing the action ID for a case.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

operations.title: Check Threat Action Status
operations.description: Check the status of an action requested on a threat.

parameters.title: Threat ID

parameters.tooltip: Specify the UUID of the threat.
parameters.description: Specify the UUID of the threat.

parameters.title: Action ID
parameters.name: actionId
parameters.tooltip: Specify the UUID representing the action ID for a threat.
parameters.description: Specify the UUID representing the action ID for a threat.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

operations.title: Download Data from Threat Log
operations.description: Download data from Threat Log in .csv format.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filter, currently the only key that is supported is receivedTime. Datetime string must follow this format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. Range is limited to 14 days.
parameters.description: Specify the filter, currently the only key that is supported is receivedTime. Datetime string must follow this format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. Range is limited to 14 days.

parameters.title: Source
parameters.name: source
parameters.tooltip: Filters threats based on the source of detection. Default value is all.
parameters.description: Filters threats based on the source of detection. Default value is all.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

operations.description: Manage a Threat identified by Abnormal Security. Use this to remediate or unremediate a threat.

parameters.description: Specify the UUID of the threat.

parameters.title: Action

parameters.description: Specify the action to perform on threat.

parameters.title: Mock Data

parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.

operations.title: Submit a Missed Attack or False Positive Report
operations.description: Use this to report a missed attack or a false positive judgement by Abnormal Security. We use this data to improve our models, and also give customers transparency into the frequency of Missed Attacks and False Positives.

parameters.title: False Positive Report Data
parameters.name: report_data
parameters.tooltip: Specify the missed attack or false positive report data.
parameters.description: Specify the missed attack or false positive report data.

value.description: Alice reported this email was missing from their inbox.

parameters.title: Mock Data
parameters.name: mock-data
parameters.tooltip: Returns test data if set to True.
parameters.description: Returns test data if set to True.
